item.title: Former CNN host Don Lemon faces charges after anti-ICE protest at Minnesota church
item.description: Lemon says he was just doing his job as a journalist reporting on the protests at the church.

item.title: Chris Mason: What Starmer's China reset tells us about his foreign policy
item.description: The prime minister has set out his vision - and now begun to match it with actions and overseas visits.

item.title: Schitt's Creek and Home Alone star Catherine O'Hara dies aged 71
item.description: The Emmy-winning actress died at her home in Los Angeles on Friday after a brief illness, her agent said.

item.title: Barcelona 'shakedown' offers first hints of F1 2026
